statements: DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE anomaly_flag = TRUE AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_value > 50 AND anomaly_flag = TRUE;
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name = 'TemperatureSensor' AND location = 'RoomA';
DELETE FROM anomalies_log WHERE log_description LIKE '%error%';
DELETE FROM readings WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND value > 100;
DELETE FROM readings WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND date < '2022-01-01';
